text: Island in the Sun is a 1957 American romance movie directed by Robert Rossen and based on the 1955 novel of the same name by Alec Waugh. It stars James Mason, Harry Belafonte, Joan Fontaine, Joan Collins, Dorothy Dandridge, Diana Wynyard, Basil Sydney, Patricia Owens and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 romance movies Category:American romance movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Rossen Category:Movies about interracial romance Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies set in Barbados Category:Movies set in Grenada
